front.title: LDAP API Extensions for Sort and Simple Paged Results

abstract.t: This document defines extensions to the LDAP v3 C language API definedin [1]. These extensions cover the sort extended control, defined in[2],and the simple paged results control, defined in [3]. N.B.: while thesort extended control can be used on its own, the simple paged resultscontrol is most useful when used on results that have already beensorted.
